# detailSubtitle

**Instance Property**

The detail card’s subtitle.

## Declaration

```swift
var detailSubtitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The template only displays a detail card when the user selects a point of interest. If this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/ObjectiveC/nil-227m0], the card displays the point of interest’s [doc://com.apple.carplay/documentation/CarPlay/CPPointOfInterest/subtitle] instead.

## Managing the Detail Card’s Data

- **detailTitle**: The detail card’s title.
- **detailSummary**: The detail card’s summary.
title: detailSubtitle
